title: The Confessions of St. Augustine
description: Saint Augustine is one of history's most prolific geniuses. With great eloquence and passion, his Confessionsa masterpiece of Western literatureexplores enduring questions that continue to stir millions.Perhaps the most moving record of a soul's journey to grace, Confessions appears midway in Saint Augustine's prodigious body of theological writings and remains his most influential work"... continues to reach contemporary readers ..."Booklist
author: Augustine of Hippo
